title: What build to get against a true damage champ
body: I play a tank champ like {{champion:111}} or {{champion:12}} . I have hard time to deal a champ that does true damage like {{champion:157}}, {{champion:114}}, or {{champion:11}}. I face a fed {{champion:114}} using {{champion:111}}. I got {{item:3075}} ,{{item:3068}} ,{{item:3742}} ,{{item:3001}} ,{{item:3111}}. She was able to kill me within 5-7 second I wasn't able to do anything to her when she reach me. Like how the heck a champ those kill a tank so easy with the build I have. I knew I will lose but get killed in 5 second isn't right. I bought all these armor and grievous wounds against her its worth like crap to her

replies.body:
Health and armor, no champion has 100% true damage conversion so you mitigate as much damage around it, in cases like Fiora and Yi, Frozen Heart and Randuin's is good to mitigate a lot of their damage.

Yasou also have no true damage.
He did 30-40% true dmg on me. It's crazy tht with all my armor I bought and he only have atk speed and crit dmg no armor penetration able to hit me hard.

> [{quoted}](name=OpenL1nk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pdZw6dyL,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2020-02-14T03:21:57.567+0000)
>

Yasou has no true damage, he has armor pen, but no true damage.

Frozen Heart doesn't do anything to Yi btw. While he is in Ult, he is immune to Slows, including Attack Speed Slows.

Moreover, Frozen Heart isn't an amazing buy vs either of them. Yi mostly builds On-Hit/Attack Speed items like {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3091}} which will lead to a whole lot more flat True Damage than any other champion. The best way to counter it is by building lots of HP. Since his Physical On-Hit effects are percent health, it means that you also need to go for Armor. Otherwise, you will be melted by his items instead of his kit.

For Fiora, most of her kit is bursty and ability focused. She relies on animation cancelling to do her DPS. Her Passive is very weak in terms of damage in the early game, making any Armor buy very powerful vs her. However, her late game Passive is monstrous and no one should try dueling her. She is made to melt anyone with it, be it Tank or Carry.

And, again, he melts you. His on-hit build deals all 3 types of damage. You build Armor then wake up with him dealing 2/3 of your health as Magic/True Damage. Not to mention Frozen Heart doesn't give any HP, which makes you a ton more vulnerable for how much it costs.

Bruh

Generally their entire job is killing you, so most often there's not a lot you can do.

Against Fiora, Tabi and Frozen Heart work well, but she has %max health true damage so she's going to be ignoring a fair portion of the tanky stats you buy. Yi generally won't be a problem unless you're trying to duel him, in which case you're simply playing wrong.

Yasuo has no true damage at all. Not one bit. Dunno what you're talking about there.

hp.
you counter true dmg by buying hp.
You pick a champ that does more true damage.

Buy only one or two defensive items - maybe Randuins+Thornmail (so you can cut the healing) and buy AP damage (most tanks have at least passable AP ratios). If you can at least half-health them, your team can probably finish them.
Fiora and Yi are terrible in teamfights - Yi can in general be good, if his team has good team comp and he waits for the main spells to be used, but you can also lose this way, if your team gets wiped out fast.

Generally, the intended counter of true damage was meant to be health and since most champions with true damage are ad, you can build armor and health.
But then you have {{champion:67}}, that one champions with %max hp true damage meaning that you either have to go pure armor (a build path that is extremely limited and works of very few champions) or perma ban the shit out of this champion
Frozen heart makes all but yi unable to auto at lightning speed
Tabi alone massively reduces Fiora's damage. Almost all of her damage is from autoattacks.
